description: [Elise](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0081) creates a file in AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer and stores all harvested data in that file.(Citation: Accenture Dragonfish Jan 2018)

external_references.description: Accenture Security. (2018, January 27). DRAGONFISH DELIVERS NEW FORM OF ELISE MALWARE TARGETING ASEAN DEFENCE MINISTERSâ€™ MEETING AND ASSOCIATES. Retrieved November 14, 2018.
